author: hustla187
title: Get the Team Running
review: This is the rest stop for any minifig bicycle rider. You get two very rare pink bikes, 3 minifigs, some banana pieces, and a repair station just in case. I like the overall design of this set and deserves a 5 out of 5.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Team Telekom) - Telekom Race Cyclists and Service Crew Review
review:
This set is a great set to have and it's also fun to play with. The build is very nice and easy and we also get a few stickers to worry about. What I didn't like about this set is that we have to put on stickers on the torso of the minifigs. This set has some cool stuff like a stand with 8 bottles and 4 bananas and we also get a workshop. The workshop has some nice tools, a podium where you can put the bike on and a bucket which has a brush in it. As I told you in the beginning: It's a great set to have - even for pieces which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
